description:
Trendercoin is the digital currency for the real world - instant and zero fee payment for everything in life with user friendly and readable wallet.

Global economy will look very different in 2020 than what it is today and for this, trendercoin projects are positioning for undeniable relevance to millenials.
More than having a stake in the future, millennials want to use blockchain technology to build it with their own hands.

Trendercoin blockchain as a revolutionary tool for creating simple solutions cutting across entertainment, industries and promoting pure transparency.
name: Trendercoin
